text: Stanley James Collard (born 25 March 1936) is an Australian politician. He is a member of the National Party. From 1975 to 1987, he served as a Senator for Queensland. He was also leader of the National Party in the Senate from 1985 to 1987. Collard was born in Maleny, Queensland. He married Gloria Pearl Auld in 1958. The couple had three children. ==References== Category:1936 births Category:Living people Category:Members of the Australian Senate Category:National Party of Australia politicians Category:Politicians from Queensland
title: Stan Collard
